values: To abuse means to hurt someone or something on purpose.
The mean man abused his dog when it barked too loudly.
vt./n.滥用，妄用；虐待，凌辱
v. to treat in a harsh or harmful way 虐待
v. to use wrongly 误用
n. a corrupt practice or custom 恶习

Abuse means to use something or someone in a harmful or cruel way.
